segments.text: This kitchen scene makes me feel a bit down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's so intent on her task, but she's missing the overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's spilling out, wetting everything, and no one cares.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the puddle, and she doesn't even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks determined, but it's risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, it'll be heartbreaking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's waiting eagerly, her little hand up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies in the jar, but this mischief could end badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is serene, highlighting the trouble inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the curtains tied back, letting in light on this unfortunate moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sad how unaware they all seem to the dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked neatly, yet chaos looms.
segments.speaker: PAR
